caption:
This photograph captures a group of four cyclists on a paved road surrounded by lush greenery. The scene appears to be set in a rural or forested area given the dense canopy of trees in the background. The road is bending slightly to the right where the cyclists are headed.

A focal point of the image is a young man in the foreground, intensely focused while looking down and gripping the handlebars of what appears to be a road or racing bicycle. He wears a light-colored T-shirt and dark shorts, which contrasts with the bright greenery around him.

Behind him, another cyclist, a young woman, is pedaling casually and looking forward with a relaxed posture. She is followed closely by two more cyclists, both women, who are further back on the road; one of them is also looking straight ahead while the other is slightly turned, perhaps speaking to her companion.

The scene captures a tranquil yet active moment, possibly during a leisurely ride in a less trafficked, natural area. On the left, at the edge of the road, there is a small, somewhat worn road sign embedded in the grass, partially obscured by the lead woman cyclist.
title: Cyclists enjoy outing on Chuckanut Drive, Larrabee State Park, during monthly Bicycle Sunday.
